body: I am going to reopen this, and I've changed the title. What you're asking for in the initial report is not quite right, but it is definitely the case that []byte("xyz") and []byte{'x', 'y', 'z'} should behave the same, whatever that behavior is. As Minux has pointed out, one is getting more benefit from escape analysis than the other, which causes the inconsistency in the benchmarks. We should fix the inconsistency. We will *not* change the semantics, though.
